## AnimationSet.getAnimationWeight() method

Gets the weight of specific animation which is currently playing

**Signature:**

```typescript
getAnimationWeight(name: string): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | Name of the animation |

**Returns:**

number

Weight of the animation or 0 if this animation is not playing
